name: C++
description: High-performance systems programming language with object-oriented features. Expert in memory management, STL containers, algorithms, and building efficient applications for competitive programming and system-level development.

name: C
description: Low-level programming language for system programming and embedded development. Proficient in pointer manipulation, memory management, data structures, and building performance-critical applications from scratch.

name: JavaScript
description: Dynamic programming language for web development. Skilled in ES6+ features, DOM manipulation, asynchronous programming, event handling, and creating interactive user interfaces for modern web applications.

name: TypeScript
description: Strongly-typed JavaScript superset for scalable applications. Experienced in type definitions, interfaces, generics, and building maintainable codebases with enhanced developer experience and error prevention.

name: Python
description: Versatile programming language for web development, data science, and automation. Proficient in Django, Flask, data analysis libraries, scripting, and building scalable backend systems and machine learning applications.

name: Ruby
description: Dynamic, object-oriented programming language focused on simplicity and productivity. Experienced in Ruby on Rails framework, metaprogramming, and building elegant web applications with clean, readable code.

name: Bash
description: Unix shell scripting for automation and system administration. Skilled in writing shell scripts, command-line tools, system monitoring, file processing, and streamlining development workflows and deployment processes.

name: HTML
description: Markup language for structuring web content. Expert in semantic HTML5, accessibility standards, form handling, SEO optimization, and creating well-structured, standards-compliant web pages and applications.

name: CSS
description: Styling language for web design and layout. Proficient in responsive design, Flexbox, Grid, animations, CSS3 features, and creating visually appealing, mobile-first user interfaces across all devices.

name: Sass
description: CSS preprocessor for enhanced styling capabilities. Experienced in variables, mixins, nesting, functions, and building maintainable, scalable stylesheets with organized architecture and reusable components for large projects.

name: React
description: JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Expert in hooks, component lifecycle, state management, JSX, and creating dynamic, interactive web applications with reusable components and modern development patterns.

name: Next.js
description: React framework for production-ready applications. Skilled in server-side rendering, static site generation, API routes, file-based routing, and building fast, SEO-optimized full-stack web applications.

name: Redux
description: Predictable state container for JavaScript applications. Experienced in managing complex application state, actions, reducers, middleware, and implementing scalable state management patterns in React applications.

name: Zustand
description: Lightweight state management library for React. Proficient in creating simple, scalable state stores with minimal boilerplate, handling complex state logic, and building efficient state management solutions.

name: React Query
description: Data fetching and caching library for React applications. Skilled in server state management, background updates, optimistic updates, and building efficient data synchronization with automatic caching strategies.

name: Tailwind CSS
description: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development. Expert in responsive design, component composition, custom configurations, and building modern, consistent user interfaces with atomic CSS classes and design systems.

name: Bootstrap
description: CSS framework for responsive web design. Experienced in grid systems, components, utilities, and creating mobile-first, cross-browser compatible interfaces with pre-built components and customizable themes.

name: Node.js
description: JavaScript runtime for server-side development. Proficient in building scalable backend services, REST APIs, real-time applications, microservices architecture, and handling asynchronous operations with event-driven programming.

name: Express.js
description: Fast, minimalist web framework for Node.js. Skilled in building RESTful APIs, middleware implementation, routing, authentication, error handling, and creating robust backend services and web applications.

name: Django
description: High-level Python web framework for rapid development. Expert in MVT architecture, ORM, admin interface, authentication, and building secure, scalable web applications with built-in features and best practices.

name: FastAPI
description: Modern, fast web framework for building APIs with Python. Proficient in automatic API documentation, type hints, async support, and creating high-performance RESTful services with modern Python features.

name: npm
description: Package manager for JavaScript and Node.js ecosystem. Experienced in dependency management, package publishing, script automation, version control, and maintaining project dependencies with security best practices.

name: Yarn
description: Fast, reliable package manager for JavaScript projects. Skilled in dependency resolution, workspace management, caching optimization, and ensuring consistent installations across development environments and production deployments.

name: Bun
description: All-in-one JavaScript runtime and toolkit. Proficient in fast package management, bundling, testing, and running JavaScript applications with improved performance and developer experience compared to traditional tools.

name: MongoDB
description: NoSQL document database for flexible data storage. Expert in document modeling, aggregation pipelines, indexing strategies, and building scalable applications with JSON-like documents and horizontal scaling capabilities.

name: MySQL
description: Relational database management system for data storage. Skilled in SQL queries, database design, performance optimization, indexing, and building robust data-driven applications with ACID compliance and reliability.

name: PostgreSQL
description: Advanced open-source relational database system. Experienced in complex queries, JSONB support, full-text search, performance tuning, and building enterprise-grade applications with advanced SQL features and extensions.

name: Pandas
description: Python library for data manipulation and analysis. Expert in data cleaning, transformation, statistical analysis, time series processing, and handling structured data with DataFrames for data science projects.

name: NumPy
description: Fundamental package for scientific computing in Python. Proficient in array operations, mathematical functions, linear algebra, random number generation, and building efficient numerical computations for data analysis.

name: Scikit-learn
description: Machine learning library for Python with various algorithms. Skilled in classification, regression, clustering, model evaluation, feature engineering, and building predictive models for data science and analytics projects.

name: TensorFlow
description: Open-source machine learning framework for deep learning. Experienced in neural networks, model training, deployment, and building AI applications with scalable machine learning solutions and production-ready models.

name: PyTorch
description: Dynamic machine learning framework for research and production. Proficient in deep learning, neural network architectures, GPU acceleration, and building flexible ML models with intuitive Python-first approach.

name: Jupyter
description: Interactive computing environment for data science and research. Expert in notebook development, data visualization, exploratory analysis, documentation, and creating reproducible research workflows with live code execution.

name: Docker
description: Containerization platform for application deployment. Skilled in container orchestration, Dockerfile creation, multi-stage builds, and deploying scalable, portable applications across different environments with consistent behavior.

name: Git
description: Distributed version control system for code management. Expert in branching strategies, merge conflicts, collaboration workflows, and maintaining clean project history with effective version control practices and team coordination.

name: Postman
description: API development and testing platform for REST services. Proficient in API testing, collection management, environment variables, automated testing, and documenting APIs with comprehensive testing suites and workflows.

name: Neovim
description: Modern, extensible text editor for efficient coding. Skilled in plugin configuration, custom key bindings, LSP integration, and creating optimized development environments with powerful editing capabilities and productivity enhancements.

name: Figma
description: Collaborative interface design tool for UI/UX development. Experienced in prototyping, design systems, component libraries, user interface design, and creating pixel-perfect designs with developer handoff capabilities.

name: Linux
description: Open-source operating system for servers and development. Expert in command-line operations, system administration, shell scripting, process management, and configuring development environments with various Linux distributions.

name: CentOS
description: Enterprise-class Linux distribution for server deployments. Skilled in system administration, package management, security configurations, and maintaining stable, reliable server environments with long-term support and enterprise features.

name: Fedora
description: Cutting-edge Linux distribution with latest technologies. Experienced in system configuration, package management, development environments, and leveraging bleeding-edge features for modern software development and innovation.
